The answer lies in Naturopathy - an approach to healthcare that combines modern treatment with traditional methods. The approach is to treat illnesses or disorders and their very cause by stimulating the body's ability to self-heal. Naturopathy combines multiple therapies including [acupuncture](./../curative-therapies/acupuncture.html), massages, the use of natural herbs, and treatments such as homeopathy which uses highly diluted substances to activate the body's healing mechanism to treat the illness. Naturopathy could also include other forms of medicine such as physical manipulations or creating a nutrition plan to enhance the body's ability to fight illnesses and disorders. The benefits of naturopathy are not restricted to treating the symptoms of the illness; it also focuses on preventing the very cause of the illness in the long term.
